trans-unit.source: Exposes <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem"></xref> types to [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Espone <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem"> </xref> tipi [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem"> </xref> che è associata a questo <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the access key for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene la chiave di accesso per il <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem"> </xref> che è associata a questo <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAccessKey*>.
trans-unit.target: Chiamato da <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAccessKey*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAccessKey*>

trans-unit.source: The access key for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: La chiave di accesso per la <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the control type for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il tipo di controllo per la <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem"> </xref> che è associata a questo <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType*>.
trans-unit.target: Chiamato da <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType"></xref> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType"> </xref> valore di enumerazione.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of child elements of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene la raccolta di elementi figlio del <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem"> </xref> che è associata a questo <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren*>.
trans-unit.target: Chiamato da <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren*>

trans-unit.source: The collection of child elements.
trans-unit.target: Raccolta di elementi figlio.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il nome della <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem"> </xref> che è associata a questo <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName*>.
trans-unit.target: Chiamato da <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName*>

trans-unit.source: A string that contains "MenuItem".
trans-unit.target: Stringa che contiene "MenuItem".

trans-unit.source: Gets the text label of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'etichetta di testo di <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem"> </xref> che è associata a questo <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetName*>.
trans-unit.target: Chiamato da <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetName*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetName*>

trans-unit.source: The name property can be thought of as the string of text that a user would use to explain which control is being referred to.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà nome può essere considerata come stringa di testo che si utilizzerebbe per spiegare il controllo viene fatto riferimento.

trans-unit.source: It is important to have a textual representation for all controls in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] so that you can programmatically refer to the control in a localized manner.
trans-unit.target: È importante disporre di una rappresentazione testuale per tutti i controlli di [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] in modo che è possibile fare riferimento al controllo è a livello di codice in modo localizzato.

trans-unit.source: The string that contains the label.
trans-unit.target: Stringa che contiene l'etichetta.

trans-unit.source: Gets the control pattern for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il pattern di controllo per il <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem"> </xref> che è associata a questo <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: If one of the following cases occurs, this method returns the current <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer> object.
trans-unit.target: Se si verifica uno dei seguenti casi, questo metodo restituisce l'attuale <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer>oggetto.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer>

trans-unit.source: - `patternInterface` equals <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface?displayProperty=fullName> and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> that is associated with this <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer> has child <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> objects.
trans-unit.target: - `patternInterface` è uguale a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface?displayProperty=fullName>e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>che è associata a questo <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer>ha figlio <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>oggetti.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: - `patternInterface` equals <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface?displayProperty=fullName> and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> that is associated with this <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer> does not have child <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> objects.
trans-unit.target: - `patternInterface` è uguale a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface?displayProperty=fullName>e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>che è associata a questo <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer>non ha figlio <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>oggetti.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: - `patternInterface` equals <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface?displayProperty=fullName> and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> that is associated with this <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer> has its checkable property set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: - `patternInterface` è uguale a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface?displayProperty=fullName>e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>che è associata a questo <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer>ha la proprietà selezionabile impostata su `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.MenuItemAutomationPeer> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If `patternInterface` equals <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface?displayProperty=fullName>, this method returns an object that implements the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISynchronizedInputProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: Se `patternInterface` è uguale a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface?displayProperty=fullName>, questo metodo restituisce un oggetto che implementa il <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISynchronizedInputProvider>interfaccia.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISynchronizedInputProvider> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: Uno dei valori di enumerazione.

trans-unit.source: An object that supports the control pattern if patternInterface is a supported value; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: Oggetto che supporta il pattern di controllo se patternInterface è un valore supportato; in caso contrario, .

trans-unit.source: This type or member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: Questo tipo o membro supporta il [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] dell'infrastruttura e non deve essere utilizzato direttamente dal codice.

trans-unit.source: The state (expanded or collapsed) of the control.
trans-unit.target: Lo stato (espansi o compressi) del controllo.

trans-unit.source: The toggle state of the control.
trans-unit.target: Lo stato di attivazione/disattivazione del controllo.
